website_summaries.verdict: What sets this set of jumper cables apart is its incredibly low price point. Delivers the same level of performance as other 4 gauge sets at half the price. Good set to purchase for younger drivers.
pros: Alligator clips get a solid "bite" on both top and side post batteries
4 gauge copper-clad aluminum wiring suitable for emergency road use
cons: Promoted as 4 gauge wire, but some users say closer to 6 or even 8 gauge
25' version better for connections, but charging time is longer
Side post batteries can be challenging

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this if you need it to carry any real amperage!
customer_reviews.text: While these jumpers look impressive on the outside they are anything but. They claim to be 4 guage wire but they are more like 8 guage! I finally got around to installing these on my battery charger, rated at 100 amps and when i cut the end off i discovered they are not 4 guage! Ive attached a picture so you all can see the wires true size!
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Bruce's Jumper Cables
customer_reviews.text: These turned out to be 6 Gauge wire and not a true 4 Gauge wire. So, I received a REFUND from Amazon and purchased welding wire 1/0 AWG on another site on the Internet. I then made myself a power cable to power my vehicle in an emergency so I may start my car. I keep a deep cycle battery in my back seat area. I would not say that these jumper cables are very satisfactory for the intended purpose! Not the sort of thing I would write home about.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce's Reviews A-Z

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: There seems to be a law that if you have jumper cables you never (or rarely) need them for yourself. At least that has been true for me. I have provided jump starts for several people and the cables have worked perfectly. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: KAS

customer_reviews.title: Look no further, buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected quality for the price. Very strong, sturdy clamps attached solidly to 4G cable. Cable is flexible, but not spongy. And, at 25 feet, there is no need for a Chinese fire drill to position vehicles. The only down side: that cheesy, cheap pouch. One would need real OCD issues to ever get it back in the pouch after use. They should have come with a cloth/canvas sack.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Earl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the 4ga jumper cables. I am a electrician and you can not even buy the wire for this cost. They arrived on time and appear to be good quality. The bag may be lacking but I keep all my truck stuff like ( chain & jumper cables) in those free give away canvass tote bags.
customer_reviews.author: D Family

customer_reviews.title: Get the 4 gauge / 25 foot cable.  It's a great price and should meet all of your requirements.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jumper cable set. The last set I had was Champion brand and lasted me for about 15 years. This is what I bought to replace that set. It seems to be holding up well in the hot/cold cycles of the season. It also comes in a nice carry case. I've used them 2 times already to help other people out and I've had no issues with length or grip. I picked the 4 gauge, 25 feet. I wouldn't get any other length or gauge, this seems to be the perfect size/rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Made a great 12v chainsaw power cable
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 gauge 25' variant because I needed a cord and clamps for a 12v electric chainsaw I built a while back. Easy to work with and they easily pass enough current to cut down small-ish trees. Good clamps, good insulation. The wire is copper clad aluminum (not as good as straight copper) but I knew that when I bought them, and the copper plating is good enough to solder terminal lugs to. I put the set of clamps I took off of these on a small winch and left them outside over the winter and they held up pretty well out there.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These are hardly 6 gauge copper coated aluminum. Absolute junk.
customer_reviews.author: Jakob Brown

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure they would have made a fine set of jumpers cables also
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cable that is very flexible. So flexible in fact that I actually ended up cutting off the battery clamps and used the cable for my RV solar panel installation. I'm sure they would have made a fine set of jumpers cables also.
customer_reviews.author: jfk

customer_reviews.title: Literally melted
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THESE!!! I tried to use these for the first time the other day and they literally started smoking and melted! Both a safety risk and a waste of money! I am extremely dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great price and the extra long length is very handy!
customer_reviews.text: Used them once and work perfect. The extra long length make them so moer practical! I have a single width long driveway and when I line up my 4 vehicles in the driveway when it's snowing and I need to keep the street clear, I always worried about one not starting when the temperature dipped below zero overnight with strong winds. I now have peace of mind that I can jump any car from behind!
customer_reviews.author: Dan H.

customer_reviews.title: Jumper cables A-plenty.
customer_reviews.text: When striking a balance between good enough and price these booster cables are more than adequate for boosting autos, boats, and mowers. The clamps are the same quality as the solid copper booster cables, strong a plenty steel with copper inserts to make the connection. When you have a need, it is not wise to go too budget. Given reasonable care, these should last longer than the purchaser and not let you down.
customer_reviews.author: J Bird

customer_reviews.title: They melted
customer_reviews.text: They burned up and melted the first time I jumped a car with them.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: A waste of money the cables are way to light guage ...
customer_reviews.text: These jumper cables are junk they wouldnt even start my minivan from my running truck when a little mini max portable power pack would.A waste of money the cables are way to light guage for this they are not 4 guage worth of copper thats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: bthomasb1

customer_reviews.title: 25 feet is perfect for everything - spend the few bucks and be more versatile.
customer_reviews.text: These babies have saved me three times! They are an absolutely supreme value, the thick gauge makes charging a heartbeat long, and overall a great deal! The 25 foot length helps if a car is dead in the garage, if the car is over a fence, or in any other just-barely-there situation. 20 feet would not have been enough! The carrying case is cheap and a pain, but I guess with something this good, it's better than just rolling them up and throwing them in the truck to get tangled.
customer_reviews.author: Informed Techy Stranger

customer_reviews.title: Best jumper cables I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty jumper cables I've purchased three sets all of them are great I'd highly recommend purchasing this item I mostly use some to jump start my pickup trucks and cars they seem to start the vehicles effortlessly every single time this is a great product for the money if you're looking for a good set of jumper cables and you don't want to pay a whole lot of money these are it is do the job pretty much every time you need them to they're highly flexible and so as long as you roll them up properly they will not tangle
customer_reviews.author: zakk

customer_reviews.title: The wire is maybe 8 at best. In a 4 gauge ring terminal I had ...
customer_reviews.text: These cables aren't 4 gauge. The wire is maybe 8 at best. In a 4 gauge ring terminal I had to double the wire to make the terminal fit. Complete falsehood on the wire size. If pay for 4 I expect 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for a few jumps
customer_reviews.text: Got several jumps then none after that. It turns out that the cable had turned to ash! I tried making a new connection but saw before my eyes what happened under the insulation. The soft wire “4 gauge” was smoldering ! I expected a 4 gauge wire to be strong enough to withstand a 12 volt surge
customer_reviews.author: R. Oduol

customer_reviews.title: These jumper cables work great. I had no issues getting the clamps to ...
customer_reviews.text: These jumper cables work great. I had no issues getting the clamps to affix to the side battery posts on my sons battery. They were nice and long - and heav duty. The only problem is that they are hard to rewind and get back into the case.
customer_reviews.author: Hurtt Mom

customer_reviews.title: Did not work in time of need
customer_reviews.text: Did not work. Spent 30 minutes trying to jump out mini van. Finally took out the cables my dad bought me when I got my first car at 18 and they jumped it within 30 seconds. Disappointed that we waited so long to try them out and now we can’t return them. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: Same set at auto parts store cost $150+
customer_reviews.text: I almost bought a 20ft set of cables at the local auto parts store for $150. I checked and found this set of the same gauge and 5ft longer for under $20. I purchased 2 sets right away. They are made of the same materials, the clamps are the same. If the coating around the wire was thicker to protect against being cut it would have 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jbm103

customer_reviews.title: Great for my use
customer_reviews.text: I needed some jumper cables to lengthen the run on my battery starter / charger. ( I hung the charter on the garage wall and needed more reach). these were great for that purpose. they were playable but sturdy, I cut 2 clamps off so i could hard wire them into the charger and the 4AWG wire looked about right (about 5mm). I'm happy with them and will likely order more to keep in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: MSM

customer_reviews.title: Lighter weight than advertised & expect carry cases to arrive broken/damaged
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be a much lighter gauge wire than described. i purchased 3 sets at the same time to give to family members. All 3 "carry cases" arrived damaged/broken. The clear plastic front of the case is extremely thin and brittle. All three arrived with large holes already in them. The carry case is maybe a one time use if it doesn't self-destruct during shipping. Nice length & cheap but wouldn't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RickB.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, great cables
customer_reviews.text: I really love these jumper cables. They saved me a lot of headaches when my car broke down. My housemate drove out with these cables and had me back up and running in less than 10 minutes. I promptly bought a pair and regret absolutely nothing. They're reliable, don't slip, have a strong grip and plenty of leeway for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria H.

customer_reviews.title: Can't leave home without it... A+++
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jumper cables that every driver should have in the trunk of his/her car...material appears to be durable and made of very high quality... length is perfect for those emergency situations that require extreme distance between the main and secondary vehicle...price and value for this item is unmatched and will recommend to all family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Funiestas

customer_reviews.title: Easiest and Best Cables for a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Well, these cables were on a friend's wish list and he was delighted when he got them for Christmas! I was impressed with the quality and the heft of the cables and I am going to order a set for my truck. Nice carry sack for them and compact...not bulky or messy. Quality product at a fair price especially compared to other products similar.
customer_reviews.author: Commando

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 gauge wire
customer_reviews.text: I needed 4 gauge cable to charge my travel trailer with my truck alternator. When I cut the cable clamps off to install a 4 gauge crimped terminal, it was a very sloppy fit. I measured the cable and found it to be slightly smaller than 6 ga. I pre ordered these for my project, so am beyond the return window. Such a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Ken

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a long length to jump my car with a dead battery in the garage. These do the trick perfectly. I am not auto mechanic and don't know what the difference between these and others might be, but I do know the value is excellent and they work great. I love the length.
customer_reviews.author: RWTop Contributor: Lego

customer_reviews.title: Great Jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a while now and I can tell you they stand up to what ever they go through. I use these to do my job and they do such a great job I bought another set for my boss who tried to save money when his own broke and didn't buy another set. He has been using them on a daily basis and they are still running strong. If you have to jump start a tractor trailer these cable will more that do the job.
customer_reviews.author: William E MacLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bite on GM sidepost battery
customer_reviews.text: Clips do not stay on gm posts. However it makes pretty sparks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to two grandsons. It's a needful thing sometimes and they didn't have any. I feel considerably relieved that they have a good set of cables for emergencies....Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but Functional
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Clips are easy to use. Clamps are made of a soft metal and easy to bend. Quality control seems lacking. Purchased a new item but received an item that had been clearly repackaged. On closer inspection found cut in the insulation of the cord. They are serviceable, but probably won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dante from AK

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure I was going to like this style clamp and I already had cold cables with the more traditional ends. This is longer than my old ones and long enough to go battery to battery even with both cars facing the same direction. The clamps are a bit smaller that the traditional style but open wide and bite on really tight. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Dilger

customer_reviews.title: NOT 8 ga. as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: NOT 8 ga. as advertised! You wouldn't know unless you cut them open! I purchased to replace cables on an older battery charger, cut one end off and wired direct. That's when I found the thinner wire. Should suffice for what we are doing, guess we will see...
customer_reviews.author: Nickm

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty clamps and cable
customer_reviews.text: This jumper cables are high quality, they're very strong, the clamps have a very strong bite I used once already and they performed excellent and th 25' is a plus needed the extra reach
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: FYI clamps are not insulated
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 8 gauge 12 foot long cables. Very inexpensive and it comes with a carrying case so that is a huge plus. I have to say i'm a little disappointed because i was hoping the clamps themselves would be insulated but they are not. Some pictures on the amazon page show them with plastic on the clamps so that was misleading to me.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Roderick

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This a great product that stores nicely under my back seat. It is durable and extra lengthy so I can easily jump vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: David William Carr

customer_reviews.title: Copper Coated Aluminium - don't seem to be quite 4 gauge, but they should do.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these are really 4 gauge, but they appear sturdy and better than the emergency kit cables I had before. Haven't had a call to use these yet. Do note that these are not copper cables but CCA (opper Coated Aluminium); hence the low price.
customer_reviews.author: QMJ

customer_reviews.title: STURDINESS
customer_reviews.text: I WAS IMPRESSED BY THE APPARENT HEAVY DUTY QUALITY OF THESE CABLES WHEN THEY ARRIVED. I AM SURE THEY ARE FAR MORE THAN WHAT IS NEEDED FOR A SIMPLE 12 VOLT SLAVE.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT THE DEAD BATTERY GODS NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: Good heavy duty jumper cables for that aggravating click click click of the dead battery when your not around an area where you can get a replacement battery quick.
customer_reviews.author: Larry B

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why but these jumper cables were not powerful enough by any means. Tried jumping my fiancé’s Ford Fiesta (compact car) using these cables with an SUV and then with a truck and it never transferred enough power to start the car. Bought some other cables that actually worked. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hargett

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy duty product . Love the long length.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty cables. Hard to find locally . This is a product that you need to keep tuck away for emergencies. You need to move the juice to crank it up. The long cables makes it easy to get to the batteries in the vehicle you trying to crank.
customer_reviews.author: rab

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 gauge - not heavy duty clamps as shown
customer_reviews.text: These are not 4 gauge and the clamps were the cheap typical claws not the heavy duty clamps shown in the picture. The cables are very flexible as described. I needed the wire for a quick connect project and was counting on those heavy duty clamps.
customer_reviews.author: matt michitsch

customer_reviews.title: Yeeeehaaaaaa
customer_reviews.text: Ouch! Do not use as nipple clamps! Damn near ripped off the left one. Oh well would have matched my beaver scar on the right side.
customer_reviews.author: Riley

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended
customer_reviews.text: Jumped my 5.3 with a Subaru's 2.2 with these cables. Kind of fat and hard to get on the terminals but works fast and well. Would rebuy but i need to make my side post battery have more room to use these again
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Liar, liar pants on fire!
customer_reviews.text: Not 4 gauge, closer to 6 gauge. I hate it when product descriptions are falsified. just know before you buy these, they are NOT 4 gauge. Will they work for most car and light trucks... yes.
customer_reviews.author: BFK

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: tried to jump off a lawnmower and 1 pair melted into!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty- great value!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my older VW Jetta that I constantly have to jump- after borrowing One that didn’t have to power to jump I got this one so impressed with quality and length (have to jump on city street and am able to park in front or behind). Had enough power to start right up and that’s after sitting for months without turning on during a very cold winter! Great product, great price and great seller!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hale

customer_reviews.title: Great cables great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of cables. Not 4 gauge more like 6 gauge. Long cable makes it nice when car is in a parking space. You don't have to roll the car out to hook up cables. Connectors grab the battery with a positive bite. Comes with a nice carrying cases to keep cables neat in trunk and not to get battery acid all over the truck
customer_reviews.author: steve w.

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect. Great price and always great on-time delivery with ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered because we realized we didn't have any. Arrived one day and the next day - dead battery. Since they were delivered in one day, it was perfect. Great price and always great on-time delivery with Amazon. Length of cables are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis E.

customer_reviews.title: Great cables
customer_reviews.text: The extra long length is so handy, doesn't matter which way the car is facing, you can jump it. Cables stay flexible in cold weather and because of the guage, it's a quick job.
customer_reviews.author: D S Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Great cables
customer_reviews.text: These jumper cables are very well made and thick enough to use on 12 volt systems. Some cables are thicker, but a nightmare to maneuver in tight places. I strongly recommend these cables for personal and professional use.
customer_reviews.author: Shutdown

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy duty booster cables. Great price couldn't get this quality in my home town nowhere near this price. I am very pleased with the product and the seller.
customer_reviews.author: L. J. B. Philander

customer_reviews.title: A great product for your car or small truck.
customer_reviews.text: It can take a fairly heavy load. The cable is very flexible which makes stowing easy. 4 stars as I was unable to jump start a small diesel generator with a very low battery.
customer_reviews.author: Kermit

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: These cables are nice and long; more so than the kind you would get in an emergency car kit from Walmart. I also like the handy carrying case it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough quality to do the job unless you live ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered another set for another car. Good enough quality to do the job unless you live below zero (F) degrees and have old batteries. Clamps seem adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Millington

customer_reviews.title: Should always be in your trunk
customer_reviews.text: They are a low cost and always good to have on hand. Wish I had gotten them when I needed them instead after but that's my own poor planning
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great bargain, and peace of mind!
customer_reviews.text: These jumper cables are of extremely high quality, and worth every cent. They come in a nice bag, and they fit nicely in the trunk. Do not hesitate as they are a great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Beech350guy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as they have a heavy gauge we need to boost RVs, pickup etc. They do a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Eggo

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and seems like the cables won't crack the insulation anytime soon
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and seems like the cables won't crack the insulation anytime soon. Having the 25ft length really helps because you don't always have to luxury of parking the cars side by side. This length allows you to park behind the car that you wanna jump start.
customer_reviews.author: Billy da Kid

customer_reviews.title: Best jumper cables.
customer_reviews.text: These are better than I thought. No more buying the cheap one from auto zone. Update. Two of the ends fell off 07/01/2018. I guess they are not as heavy duty as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with these. I bought them for my husband who travels for a living. You never know when you may need jumper cables. These are very good quality and my husband really liked them.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marie Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are indeed 4-gauge x 25ft. The clamps are sturdy. The carrying case is decent. A cable of equal specs will cost you twice as much at the box store. I threw my old cables out and put a set of these in each of my automobiles.
customer_reviews.author: Andy in Utah

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I use them with my jeep wrangler. They are plenty long enough and work great
customer_reviews.author: Tim Long

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected quality for the price. Very strong, sturdy clamps attached solidly to 4G cable. The bag may be lacking but I keep all my truck stuff like ( chain & jumper cables) in those free give away canvass tote bags. This is a great jumper cable set. The clamps are the same quality as the solid copper booster cables, strong a plenty steel with copper inserts to make the connection.Heavy duty cable that is very flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Oleg

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, length allows more choice in positioning. Compact package but hard to roll tight enough to get back into the storage carry pack. For the money its a bargain since it sill only be used for emergencies not tow truck duty.
customer_reviews.author: James - Oneof6

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: very well made heavy duty jumper cables. 25 foot are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Every vehicle should have jumper cables in the trunk. These cables latch on great and are heavy duty. 4 gauge is what I prefer, especially in a longer cable (25') I They are well made and worth the price. I am very satisfied with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Stein Stromsoe

customer_reviews.title: Which is good but I now have cables in all of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have not had to use the jumper cables yet. Which is good but I now have cables in all of my cars so I am fully prepared should the need for starting up assistance be required. A quality buy at a very reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Would highly recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Sturdiest set of jumper cables I've ever owned. Would highly recommend to others. Length is great to accommodate awkwardly positioned vehicles or restricted access.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the 4ga jumper cables. I am hobby refurbisher of outboards. I’ve check the price on making my own cable couldn’t buy the wire for the price of these cables. They arrived on time and appear to be good quality. I’ve even able to put the cables back in the bag they came in
customer_reviews.author: Edward Ortgiesen

customer_reviews.title: Very, very nice.
customer_reviews.text: These are better than I expected. The are very heavy duty. Th clamp endsare very strong and nice. Glad I bought these.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Seem decent.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used yet, but these are big sturdy cables. Not sure if they will fit back into the bag once they are out. I would prefer the bag be larger. Got a feeling it’s going to be hard to get these back into the case
customer_reviews.author: Bryan H

customer_reviews.title: Very good Jumpstart cable.
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time. it was well packaged. looks very sturdy and well made. i have used it to jumpstart my car v4 engine twice. it worked very well. i plan to buy one more to keep in my other car. 16ft is better than the 12ft i had previously. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Narasud

customer_reviews.title: These are beefy decent 4GA wire. Plenty of length ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beefy decent 4GA wire. Plenty of length. Had no problems with punctured cables, though since the handles hook directly to the wire anyway, a puncture wouldn't have made much difference.
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: Worked good so far
customer_reviews.text: Strong clamps, just the right gauge for diesel trucks or 4wd trucks etc
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: And the flexibility is amazing! good
customer_reviews.text: Work just well. And the flexibility is amazing! good cables
customer_reviews.author: pedrojmartm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Used these to recharge dead batteries on my Dad's Honda Accord and a relative's Prius, using my VW Passat as the base. Heavy duty, quality construction. Long length gets the charge farther. Everyone should have these cables in their car!
customer_reviews.author: Forbisher

customer_reviews.title: Great jumper cables for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These seem well made. I've used a few times with no issue
customer_reviews.author: LivewithPassion

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't have any other cables!
customer_reviews.text: I can't express how great it is having 20 foot jumper cables! I am super satisfied with my purchase! The quality is very good, and I would advise anyone that's looking for a set of jumper cables to pick these up.
customer_reviews.author: Qwyntrell C.

customer_reviews.title: good heavy gauge and good length
customer_reviews.text: Used it to start a stalled vehicle very convenient length of cables I was able to jump car without changing position of my car
customer_reviews.author: wow

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and plenty long
customer_reviews.text: No need to have to get close to jump start the car anymore, these are nice and long, seem well made, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.author: William A Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Big, strong, long and in a good bag
customer_reviews.text: These look great.25 feet packaged nicely in a decent zip bag. My one day delivery took three, but this looks like it will fit the bill. I wanted them long enough to do any task.
customer_reviews.author: DTee

customer_reviews.title: Nice jumping cables
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size jumping cables for the price. I actually had to put them to use recently and everything work out perfectly!! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: chris3

customer_reviews.title: Nice, solid product
customer_reviews.text: Nice, solid product that comes in an excellent carrying bag. Note: The 4 gauge, although having a lower number than say 6 or 8 gauge, is actually thicker and used for larger vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: EJF

customer_reviews.title: Haven't quite figured out what's wrong with them
customer_reviews.text: Have to always pull out my old ones to jump-start tractors trucks something's not right
customer_reviews.author: aj

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had to use these yet, but all I can say is "Wow"! These things look heavy duty enough to jump start a bulldozer! The cables are the heaviest gauge I've ever seen for jumper cables. The clamps are equally as well made. The price is reasonable too. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: aws6241

customer_reviews.title: Good cables
customer_reviews.text: This is a good set that allows you to jump a car quick, they are strong an sturdy and have a length.
customer_reviews.author: Justbird

customer_reviews.title: but they are very heavy duty and come with a nice little carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Since I haven't had to use the cables yet I can't review the performance, but they are very heavy duty and come with a nice little carry bag. I have no doubt the will do the job!
customer_reviews.author: superrgf

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Was thinking that these would be of cheap quality but I was shocked to see the clamps where heavy duty. Very happy with this purchase will buy again if I need another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Joey S.

customer_reviews.title: Not pure copper wire !!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but they have to be made with aluminum wire. If I would have known this I would have bought something else
customer_reviews.author: led slingr

customer_reviews.title: Long and decent cable, reasonable price, but cheap bag!
customer_reviews.text: The cable and clamps are decent. The plastic bag is a real drawback and you can hardly use it again once you take the cable out for the first time. It is too tight, and the cable goes in there only if you wrap it the exact same way it was. Other than the bag, the cable, its length, its quality and of course price are very good.
customer_reviews.author: Saeed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 4-Gauge cables to jump dead batteries. 12 feet length to accommodate most situations.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford D. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice cables
customer_reviews.text: Gotta say, quality seems pretty good. Couldnt beat the price on a 4 guage 25 foot set
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Just as described...perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Great for our large engine car. Good length. Only downside for me is that it's very tight (good thing) but difficult for a weaker person to squeeze.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 4 gauge 25ft set, they cannot cast enough current to start any car I have tried to jump, I have tried to jump everything from small 4 cylinder Honda to large v8 and every single time I had to let it charge for about 15-30 minutes before the battery was charged enough to start the car. Real jumper cables will carry enough current to start the engine using the full battery of the other vehicle, these cables are only good for charging your battery using another car
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: A must for every car.
customer_reviews.text: You never know when a battery will die. Just get a set and make your father proud.
customer_reviews.author: dgedffghfdvgff

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: These jumper cables are made very well and have a awsome price. They come in their own carry bag which is pretty convenient. They have work flawlessly so far and no complaints with the engineering of them. If you are looking for a great set of jumper cables no need to look any further.
customer_reviews.author: Corey A. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Great product,great bargain price 👍
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very strong, I do like it a lot, and it did work so fast when other jumper cables didn’t. I do recommend and the price was a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette M

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I had to use it for the first time this past weekend. Works just fine. Easy to re-coil and put back in pouch.
customer_reviews.author: Syber_Robyn

product_meta.title: OxGord Jumper Cable Heavy Duty Battery Booster for Most Cars Trucks Vans SUVs - Includes Handy Travel/Storage Bag (4 Gauge 25 Feet)
product_meta.description:
Size:4 Gauge 25 Feet

Breathe new life into your vehicle with the Jumper Cable Kit from OxGord, your #1 brand for auto parts & accessories.

Our booster cables are the only set you’ll need to give your car, van, or SUV that extra boost. They’re ideal for jumpstarting car batteries when they haven’t been used for some time, or after the battery has been drained. So if you forgot to turn off your headlights, or the lighting in the interior of the vehicle, there’s no need to worry, because you have the right tools and accessories to revive your automobile.

 Strong clamps: Our clamps with copper teeth will remain securely attached to the battery terminal as power transfers from the live battery to the dead battery.

Save space: Includes a CCA carrying bag for easy storage inside the trunk of your vehicle or boat.

Easy to use: Charging your automobile will only take a matter of minutes.

Multiple sizes: Choose from 4 gauge 12 feet, 4 gauge 25 feet, and 10 gauge 25 feet to best meet your needs.

Features: 

• Copper teeth 
• Thermoplastic rubber construction 
• Tangle-free 
• Cold temperature resistant 
• CCA Carrying case

Warranty: 1-year limited manufacturer’s warranty.

For your convenience and safety, please read the instructions and warnings printed on the back of the carry case before using the booster cables.

Please see other OxGord products to fulfill all of your automotive accessory needs.
feature_bullets: CARRY CASE: Includes a CCA (Copper Coated Aluminum) Travel Bag to Prevent Tangling in your trunk.

DURABLE: Built with dual construction and extra strong-grip copper teeth. These heavy-duty jumper cables are constructed of TPR material (Thermoplastic Rubber), providing low-temperature resistance (-40 degree Fahrenheit/ -40 degree Celsius).
ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The color-coded red and black cords with an Intuitive design will keep you from accidentally crossing wires and are easy to use on the top-post and side- terminal batteries.
GUARANTEE: Includes one (1) year limited warranty.
